name: Hello Dream DEFINITIVE Mobile
description:
"Hello dream".. one of my oldest projects. About a year ago I've created a Remaster version of the game.. but it was just better art.. and now... its time to show u....... the.. DEFINITIVE EDITION!! 

What's New: New game code, new goal, good grapics, new art, added menus, added lobbys, added multyplayer, added friend lists, added in-game text chat, added Save State function, chat, multiplayer, friends list also now you can play with your SpikeLauncher profile and a lot more...
